name: Four Powers
description:
Mage of four powers is in trouble! After succeed battle he'd been trapped inside battlefield. Can You escape from this sacred castle?

Send powers to walls to fill sockets. After all sockets are filled then wall will dissapear. But remember! If You fill some of sockets, and then send power which doesn't belong to any socket or all sockets of this power are already filled then all filled sockets will be gone!

Use Q, W, E, R to send powers according to the legend.

The more sockets wall have, to more score You will get!

This game is done for Weekly Game Jam - Week 37 'Combination'
